mapper.select: SELECT mr.user_id AS userId, SUM(mr.match_play_time) AS totalPlay, SUM(mr.victory_or_defeat = 'victory') AS wins, SUM(mr.victory_or_defeat = 'defeat') AS losses, ROUND(SUM(mr.victory_or_defeat = 'victory') / COUNT(*) * 100, 1) AS winRate FROM match_result mr JOIN match_table mt ON mt.match_idx = mr.match_idx WHERE mr.user_id = #{userId} AND mt.match_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY mr.user_id

SELECT mt.match_mode AS matchMode, h.heroes_name AS heroName, h.role AS role, SUM(mr.match_play_time) AS playTime, COUNT(*) AS matches FROM match_result mr JOIN match_table mt ON mt.match_idx = mr.match_idx JOIN heroes h ON h.heroes_idx = mr.heroes_idx WHERE mr.user_id = #{userId} AND mt.match_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY mt.match_mode, h.heroes_idx ORDER BY playTime DESC
